data.title: Kaziranga's (Indian National Park) ruthless rangers have reduced rhino poaching by simply gunning down poachers at sight

A Brazilian Supreme Court justice called on Friday for the legalization of marijuana and even cocaine to undo the growing power of drug gangs behind a wave of violence that has shaken Latin America's largest country.
Google ordered to share Gmail messages from non-US users with FBI
Tennis: Germans outraged as U.S. plays Nazi version of anthem
'Extraordinary' levels of toxic pollution found in 10km deep Mariana trench

'We had to sue': the five lawyers taking on China's authorities over smog. In an unprecedented legal case, a group of Chinese lawyers have charged the governments of Beijing, Tianjin & Hebei with failing to protect their citizens from air pollution, linked to 1/3 of all deaths in the country
Thousands of Deadly U.S. Military Airstrikes Not Disclosed by Pentagon Under Bush and Obama
Pensioners in the UK now have more income than the entire working age population.
Donald Trump's visit to the UK 'will be rescheduled' to avoid embarrassing him
Journalists who obtain leaked official material could be sent to prison under new proposals
Putin and Russia are using cyber attacks and fake news to try and rig three major European elections this year
Pakistan court bans Valentine's Day for being unIslamic. It has prohibited all public celebrations and any media coverage because the celebration is not part of Muslim traditions.

French presidential frontrunner Emmanuel Macron is being targeted by Russian media and internet attacks from within Russia with the goal of helping the election campaigns of his pro-Moscow rivals, his party chief said

Tipping point: revealing the cities where exercise does more harm than good: In at least 15 cities, air pollution has now become so bad that the danger to health of just 30 minutes of cycling each way outweighs the benefits of exercise altogether, according to new research
Child sex doll trial opens Pandora's box of questions about child porn
